translation.start_infobox:
With the channel popout window you can use F11 to switch into fullscreen.
Because of limitations of NW.js the fullscreen button in the twitch player won't work.

In the linux version the flash plugin will not work. The twitch player will not work becaus of this. I can't change that. Maybe there will be an update for NW.js to fix this.
